availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Corbin, Sr. (Henry County, Kentucky, retired farmer)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, retired farmer. Virginia native. Married to Sidney Corbin. Father of John Corbin, Jr. Farmer in Henry County in 1850. Retired farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Henry County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860. Household owned an additional four enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 364B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 582.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 424-25.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 190B.
